    Class Description
    Cluster  
    NodePair  
    NodePortTuple
    A NodePortTuple is similar to a SwitchPortTuple but it only stores IDs instead of references to the actual objects.
    OrderedNodePair  
    TopologyInstance
    A representation of a network topology.
    TopologyInstanceTest  
    TopologyManager
    Topology manager is responsible for maintaining the controller's notion of the network graph, as well as implementing tools for finding routes through the topology.
